plot: Introverted Dal-ho falls in love with a woman who works in a music shop but he is too shy to talk to her. Instead, he goes to the shop everyday pretending to buy tapes just to watch her. ...
title: Sarangui nakshi
plot_es: Introverted Dal-ho falls in love with a woman who works in a music shop but he is too shy to talk to her. Instead, he goes to the shop everyday pretending to buy tapes just to watch her. ...
